perturbation.original_text: During the Term of this Agreement, the Co-Branded Service will be accessible from any Dassault Systemes Web site(s), as determined by Dassault Systemes in its sole discretion, on a fully transparent basis by way of a direct link to the first Web page of the Co-Branded Service. Upon exiting the Co-Branded Service, the Dassault Systemes Customers will be automatically returned to the Dassault Systemes Web site. PlanetCAD shall, with consultation and input from Dassault Systemes, perform all services necessary for the implementation of such link between the Dassault Systemes Web site and the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term of this Agreement, the Co-Branded Service will be accessible from any Dassault Systemes Web site(s), as determined by Dassault Systemes in its sole discretion, on a fully transparent basis by way of a direct link to the first Web page of the Co-Branded Service. Upon exiting the Co-Branded Service, the Dassault Systemes Clients will be automatically returned to the Dassault Systemes Web site. PlanetCAD shall, at its sole discretion, perform all services necessary for the implementation of such link between the Dassault Systemes Web site and the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Dassault Systemes Customers' is changed to 'Dassault Systemes Clients'. The original text states 'PlanetCAD shall, with consultation and input from Dassault Systemes, perform all services necessary' now reads 'PlanetCAD shall, at its sole discretion, perform all services necessary'. These changes creates confusion about the obligations to each party.

perturbation.original_text: Unless otherwise agreed by the parties: (i) PlanetCAD will host the Co-Branded Service at its facilities and shall be responsible for providing the Infrastructure necessary to operate such service; (ii) the party responsible for hosting the Co-Branded Service shall be responsible for all customer billing as set forth in Section 5.1  [Customer Billing] herein; (iii) Dassault Systemes will provide first level customer support; (iv) PlanetCAD will provide second level customer support, and (v) PlanetCAD shall be responsible for all updates and Enhancements of the Co-Branded Service. PlanetCAD shall not charge Dassault Systemes any hosting fee for the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.changed_text: Unless otherwise agreed by the parties: (i) PlanetCAD will host the Co-Branded Service at its facilities and shall be responsible for providing the Infrastructure necessary to operate such service; (ii) the party responsible for hosting the Co-Branded Service shall be responsible for all client billing as set forth in Section 5.1  [Customer Billing] herein; (iii) Dassault Systemes will provide basic client care; (iv) PlanetCAD will provide advanced client care, and (v) PlanetCAD shall be responsible for some updates and some Enhancements of the Co-Branded Service. PlanetCAD shall not charge Dassault Systemes any hosting fee for the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'customer billing' is replaced with 'client billing,' 'first level customer support' is changed to 'basic client care', 'second level customer support' is changed to 'advanced client care'. The language 'all updates and Enhancements' is changed to 'some updates and some Enhancements', all creating ambiguity about PlanetCAD's obligations for providing the services.

perturbation.original_text: For so long as PlanetCAD hosts the Co-Branded Service, PlanetCAD will maintain and continuously update Dassault Systemes' Customer Database(s), which shall include without limitation, databases of Dassault Systemes Customers, of demands from and results of Web services supplied to Dassault Systemes Customers and associated Net Revenue and of data collected via the Customer Relations Management ("CRM") environment. The Dassault Systemes Customer Databases must be held separately from any other databases held or maintained by PlanetCAD. If not held separately, the Dassault Systemes Customer Databases must be clearly identified and sorted out as the property of Dassault Systemes and the provisions regarding PlanetCAD's limited right of use and its obligation of confidentiality as set forth below apply without change.
perturbation.changed_text: For so long as PlanetCAD hosts the Co-Branded Service, PlanetCAD will maintain and continuously update Dassault Systemes' Client List, which shall include without limitation, databases of Dassault Systemes Clients, of demands from and results of Web services supplied to Dassault Systemes Customers and associated Net Revenue and of data collected via the Customer Relations Management ("CRM") environment. The Dassault Systemes Client List must be held separately from any other databases held or maintained by PlanetCAD. If not held separately, the Dassault Systemes Customer Databases must be clearly identified and sorted out as the property of Dassault Systemes and the provisions regarding PlanetCAD's limited right of use and its obligation of confidentiality as set forth below apply without change.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Customer Database(s)' is changed to 'Client List' and 'Customers' is changed to 'Clients'. This creates confusion whether the databases are the same. This introduces ambiguity in the specific obligations related to data management, potentially affecting compliance and data ownership.
